comment: Took him for interactive writing a few years ago and really enjoyed his class. I feel like he made it very accessible to people who don't know a lot about DND type games and provided a solid overview on the components of writing for not just games but any kind of medium where you need there to be choices. good prof, would take again!

Professor Greene's class was very easy. I got 100 on all of the essays. He assigns about 2 to 3 discussion posts every week. Most of them were easy, only taking about 20 minutes or less. I would definitely take him online again.

10/10 professor. 
- very organized 
- chill 
- easy grader 
Take him if you can!!! Mr. Greene was definitely my favorite professor at Kennesaw!

I don't have any interest in a career in gaming, but Jeff is so great that I still enjoyed the class. He's very nice and understanding. The work can be a lot at times, but he is a lenient grader and truly wants to help you improve your writing. Do yourself a favor and take one of his classes before you leave Kennesaw, one of my favorite professors.

Really good professor even if you are not the best at literature. He cares about his students and wants all of them to pass. There are weekly discussions every week but they are really easy and 4 essays. All the essays are topics that you pick so it makes it way easier.

Professor Greene is such a nice guy. He truly cares about students and his class was set up to be easy as long as you keep up with the work. I really can't say anything bad about him. He responds to emails within minutes sometimes and if he's done lecturing he'll dismiss class early.

Professor Greene was one of my favorite professors. Unfortunately during our semester he was going through a lot but he still made time for us and responded to emails. he is a great professor and is easy to talk to and easily accessible. the work load isnt too bad and hes a very sweet and generous person. Great guy!

Professor Greene was my favorite teacher this semester! Take him if you want an easy A. There are 4 papers which are all really easy and short discussion posts each week. He also responds to emails very quickly and offers assistance when needed. I seriously can't say anything bad about him.

Best professor I've had all year! Weekly discussion posts and 4 papers, which are all very easy. He answers emails very quickly and gives great feedback on assignments. Easy A if you complete every assignment in class. Take him if you can!!

He responds to emails quickly and will put in effort to make sure you succeed in his class. The class consists of weekly discussion posts and 4 essays. Is a fair grader and lets you revise essays. This class is definitely an easy A as long as you do all the work.

Class consists of weekly discussions posts and 4 essays. Is a fair grader and lets you revise essays. An easy A if you do all the work and he puts in effort to make sure you succeed in his class. 10/10 would recommend:)

I can not say this enough, TAKE FROM THIS PROFESSOR! I have never been a good writer, but this class restored my faith in my writing skills. Professor Greene provides amazing feedback and allows students to revise their essays and turn them back in at the end of the semester. Be sure to read the rubrics very carefully.

Professor responds quickly to emails and questions about assignments. Professor made class enjoyable and tried to relate with his students. He provides textbooks and resources for the assignments and quizzes and provides examples of what he expects on assignments. Really nice professor.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Super open-minded and is cool with disagreement. If you want extra feedback, go to his office and he will talk to you. He doesn't seem personable at first (to me) but he really is cool. One complaint is that workshop guidelines were not given which gave some students leeway to be rude. Just ignore those people because he will let them talk.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Would take again

comment: Amazing teacher, definitely keeps the class engaged, very understanding.
